meaningMnemonic: <radical>Bamboo</radical> <radical>heaven</radical> is a place for <kanji>laugh</kanji>ing. Bamboo is a very jolly plant, and they love to laugh. Even after death in bamboo heaven, the bamboo continue to laugh joyfully. Bamboo heaven is truly a place of laughter.
readingMnemonic: There’s actually a war a goin’ on up in that there bamboo heaven, y’know? Ye might not have heard of it with all that there <kanji>laugh</kanji>in’ a goin’ on, but there definitely be a <reading>war a</reading> (わら) goin’ on up in bamboo heaven, y’hear? The bamboo are scared so that’s why they be laughin’ so much. They nervous.
